parameters.filterByFormula: AND({Phone Valid},NOT({SMS Stop}),NOT({Booked}),LEN({Phone})>0,{SMS Eligible},NOT({Current Coaching Client}),OR(AND({Processing Status}='Ready for SMS',{SMS Batch Control}='Active'),{Processing Status}='In Sequence'))

parameters.text: SMS Batch Complete: {{ $items('Parse SMS Response', 0).length }} messages processed. {{ $items('Parse SMS Response', 0).filter(item => item.json.sms_status === 'Sent').length }} sent successfully.

project.name: UYSP Lead Qualification Agent
project.description: Automated lead qualification and SMS outreach system that processes Kajabi form submissions, enriches B2B leads through two-phase qualification, scores them 0-100 using AI, and sends personalized SMS to qualified prospects while maintaining strict compliance and cost controls.
